name: Unearthed (OmarK)
description:
The way forward is through the portal, but the way is blocked, and your only solution is out of this Earth... that is, in other Earths.

Use WASD to move, and hope between Earths using the Space key or by clicking the icons at the bottom to make your way to the portal.

PS: I may have forgotten to include a restart button... so if you fall off the map, just go back and forward a level to restart your position 😅

Credits:

3D blocks and props: http://kenney.nl/
Character: https://kaylousberg.itch.io/
Music: https://www.kai-engel.com/
